name: src/listbox/change-event.js
ChangeEvent
description: Custom event emitted when the selected option of a {@link ListBox} has changed.

params.name: index
params.description: The index of the newly selected option

unknown.tagValue: {number} the index of the newly selected item (-1 for none)

return.description: the index of the newly selected item (-1 for none)

name: src/listbox/index.js
src/listbox/listbox-option.js
ListBoxOption
description: An option to be nested within a {@link ListBox} element

unknown.tagValue: {boolean} whether the option is currently selected or not

return.description: whether the option is currently selected or not

unknown.tagValue: {string} The label or text content to be used by assistive technologies to describe the option

return.description: The label or text content to be used by assistive technologies to describe the option

name: label
description: Reflects on ``aria-label`` attribute

name: src/listbox/listbox.js
ListBox
description:
Implements the ListBox pattern for single select ListBox where the focus follows the selection.

Keyboard interaction is handled for <kbd>Up Arrow</kbd> and <kbd>Down Arrow</kbd>. In the same way if one option is clicked, then it becomes selected

unknown.tagValue: Some custom template Other option selected by default
{number} - The current number of available options

return.description: The current number of available options

unknown.tagValue: {number} The index of the currently selected option, -1 if none is selected

return.description: The index of the currently selected option, -1 if none is selected

name: selectedIndex
description: Reflects on ``aria-activedescendant`` attribute

params.name: index
params.description: The index of the new option element to select

name: src/listbox/util.js

content:
{
  "name": "@citykleta/ui-kit",
  "version": "0.1.0",
  "description": "web components for common widgets used across citykleta organization",
  "main": "./dist/index",
  "module": "./dist/citykleta-ui-kit.js",
  "scripts": {
    "serve": "http-serve -p 3002",
    "build": "rollup -c ./rollup/build.js",
    "build:test": "rollup -c ./rollup/test.js",
    "build:docs": "rm -rf docs && esdoc",
    "test:ci": "http-serve -s -p 3002 & (npm run test | tap-set-exit)",
    "test": "node ./test/run-test.js",
    "dev": "npm run serve & npm run test:build -- -w"
  },
  "files": [
    "dist"
  ],
  "repository": {
    "type": "git",
    "url": "git+https://github.com/Citykleta/ui-kit.git"
  },
  "keywords": [
    "ui",
    "ux",
    "components",
    "web-components",
    "webcomponents",
    "aria",
    "ally",
    "wai-aria",
    "widgets"
  ],
  "author": "Laurent RENARD",
  "license": "MIT",
  "bugs": {
    "url": "https://github.com/Citykleta/ui-kit/issues"
  },
  "homepage": "https://github.com/Citykleta/ui-kit#readme",
  "devDependencies": {
    "esdoc": "^1.1.0",
    "esdoc-standard-plugin": "^1.0.0",
    "http-serve": "^1.0.1",
    "puppeteer": "^1.20.0",
    "rollup": "^1.22.0",
    "rollup-plugin-node-resolve": "^5.2.0",
    "tap-set-exit": "^1.1.1",
    "zora": "^3.0.3"
  }
}
name: package.json
test/listbox/listbox-option.spec.js
test0
description: ListBoxOption component

name: test1
description: ListBoxOption component is connected

name: test2
description: label property getter should default to textContent if attribute is not present

name: test3
description: label property setter should reflect on aria-label attribute

name: test4
description: selected property getter

name: test/listbox/listbox.spec.js
test5
description: ListBox component

name: test6
description: Empty ListBox is connected

name: test7
description: ListBox with some options but no default value is connected

name: test8
description: ListBox with some options and default value is connected

name: test9
description: updating the selected index property should update the component

name: test10
description: click an option should select it

name: test11
description: arrow key down should select the next option

name: test12
description: arrow key down should keep the last option in case it is already selected

name: test13
description: arrow key up should select the last option if none is selected

name: test14
description: arrow key up should select the previous option

name: test15
description: arrow key up should keep the first option selected if it is already selected

name: test16
description: listbox should emit "change" event when selected option changes
